description: Fetches content from a news URL, then filters and extracts the most relevant sections based on a specific query. This tool performs an end-to-end process of scraping and semantic analysis.

input.url: string, required. The full URL of the news article or RSS feed to be processed.
input.query: string, required. The user's specific question to find the most relevant information within the content.

relevant_sections.chunk: The most relevant paragraph or section from the article that matches the query.
